import React, { Component } from "react"; import SEO from "../../../common/SEO"; import Layout from "../../../common/AdminLayout"; import axios from "../../../axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ScrollAnimation from "react-animate-on-scroll"; import { Col, Container, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Separator from "../../../components/separator/Separator"; import SectionTitle from "../../../components/sectionTitle/SectionTitle"; export default class InMagazine extends Component { state = { name: null, content: null, photo: null, title1: null, title2: null, title3: null, title4: null, datetime: null, serial: null, bigContent: null, sponser: null, sponser1: null, sponser2: null, aguulgaPhoto: null, aguulgaTitle1: null, aguulgaTitle2: null, aguulgaText1: null, aguulgaHuman: null, aguulgaPhoto1: null, aguulgaTitle3: null, aguulgaTitle4: null, aguulgaText2: null, aguulgaPhoto2: null, aguulgaTitle5: null, aguulgaTitle6: null, aguulgaText3: null, aguulgaHuman1: null, aguulgaPhoto3: null, aguulgaTitle7: null, aguulgaTitle8: null, aguulgaText4: null, aguulgaHuman2: null, aguulgaPhoto4: null, aguulgaTitle9: null, aguulgaTitle10: null, aguulgaText5: null, aguulgaHuman3: null, error: null, success: null, deleted: null, loading: false, }; goBack = () => { this.props.history.goBack(); }; handleType = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value, error: null, success: null }); }; componentDidMount = () => { this.setState({ loading: true }); axios .get("books/" + this.props.match.params.id) .then((result) => this.setState({ ...result.data.data, error: null, loading: false }) ) .catch((err) => { this.setState({ error: err.response.data.error.message, loading: false, }); }); }; handleSave = () => { this.setState({ loading: true, success: null }); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const headers = { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }; axios .put( "books/" + this.props.match.params.id, { name: this.state.name, price: this.state.price, content: this.state.content, }, { headers } ) .then((result) => { this.setState({ ...result.data.data, error: null, loading: false, success: "Амжилттай хадгалагдлаа...", }); this.props.history.push("/adminMagazines"); }) .catch((err) => { this.setState({ error: err.response.data.error.message, loading: false, }); }); }; handleDelete = () => { this.setState({ loading: true, success: null }); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const headers = { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }; axios .delete("books/" + this.props.match.params.id, { headers }) .then((result) => { this.setState({ deleted: true, }); this.props.history.push("/adminMagazines"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); this.setState({ error: err.response.data.error.message, loading: false, }); }); }; render() { if (this.state.deleted) { return (
Ном амжилттай устгагдлаа...
); } return ( <>

Magazine Устгах Magazine Хадгалах ); } }
